name: Richard
description: I am goal-oriented, kindhearted, positive and communicative. As a friend I am respectful, reliable, sincere and always ready to give my supporting shoulder. As a partner I am faithful, honest, devoted and trustworthy. I am open for the whole world and especially for my beloved Partner. As a man I am romantic, warm, caring, with big heart full of unspent Love. And as your person, as your friend, as your partner, as your man I will make you extremely happy.
